properties.name: icon
properties.description: Specifies the icon to be displayed on the action sheet button.

properties.name: stylingMode
properties.description: Specifies which style to apply to the button that is an action sheet item.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Specifies the [type] of the button that is an action sheet item.

Events.name: onClick
Events.description: A handler for the [click] event raised for the button representing the given action sheet button.
